item.description:
Bonfire, Pot luck BBQ / Picnic, Wimp Volleyball & Kayaking

Sunday May 29th. an ALL DAY EVENT!

Kayaking from 1 pm. to two or any time til around 9 pm.

Not Kayaking? Just want to do the BBQ at 4 pm. or just play Volleyball at 3, til dark.

 PICNIC / BBQ: BYOD & FOOD 4 YOURSELF & A LITTLE TO SHARE.

Bring your own chairs sun screen, boats, and what ever?

A DOG AND KID FRIENDLY EVENT!

Cost: Parking $5. or, it is free. If you rent a boat?

KAYAKS RENTALS: $5 HR. for a one or a two seat boats. $25 for the day.

Have your own boat? No problem, but there is a $5. parking fee for those not renting.

We put reservation was placed for a warm sunny day.

IF IT RAINS, SNOWS OR IS JUST TOO COLD? THIS EVENT IS CANCELED!

Edgewater Canoe & Kayak

35 Edgewater drive hooksett , NH.

Please reserve your boat.

Call Rob at 603-540-6520 or 603-485-9251 He will return your call.

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net 

Volunteers needed, before, during, and after, please!

Please, what trash we bring in. We must bring trash out.

Gas grills will be available.

Info. on carpooling from your area or Nashua and Manchester, or to help, call Steve O.

    Bring the friends, kids and dogs, and please join Steve O. and friends, and lets go kayaking, have BBQ, play some volletball and enjoy a fire. This is great setting for new people to the sport of kayaking and volleyball. Also for the old timers to these sports. It is a low cost easy setting for parking, easy in, easy out. People can learn or improve their kayaking & volleyball skills, and enjoy themselves at the same time. We'll paddle up the Merrimack river for a few hours and stop at a park along the river. Where we will take a break. So bring some water an a snack. Then we will head up river again. Then float back down. Once we feel we are done. The river is wide and easy to move along. This is a good opportunity to see if you like these sports.

Please, call ahead to reserve your boat. Sunday looks to be nice and sunny.

  Edgewater has many different types of rentals at only $5/ hour, or $25 for the day. The same price for either a one seat or a two seat boat. Plus, you can take the rental anywhere at anytime. So lets have some fun on the water. bring your sunscreen, cameras ,water, food, snacks, bug spray and smiles.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group
